function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased reliance on digital tools and remote work may lead to decreased attention to health and safety protocols on site, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of new staff into the organization may pose a risk of disease transmission if proper onboarding protocols are not in place","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital modeling and visualization tools may lead to decreased physical collaboration, potentially hindering effective problem-solving and communication","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delays in project completion due to lockdown and high-risk personnel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Communication challenges between off-site manager and on-site team","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on digital tools for construction coordination","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Site engineers and surveyors forced to work from home due to covid-19 lockdown rules","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in providing required services due to high-risk personnel unable to conduct on-site work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-risk personnel unwilling to risk their health to conduct critical surveying tasks on-site","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in managing project teams due to remote work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to conduct site investigations and health inspections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Threats to data validity due to remote data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting semi-structured interviews without proper safety measures may lead to the potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of purposive sampling technique based on ease of access may result in a biased sample selection and overlooking important perspectives.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing a qualitative research methodology without considering the impact of covid-19 and the potential changes in data collection due to lockdown rules may lead to incomplete or inaccurate findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to people not adhering to lockdown rules","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in infrastructure projects due to covid-19 lockdown restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on construction industry’s supply chains and workforce","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High transmission of covid-19 through contact, droplets, and contaminated surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on vulnerable populations, including the elderly and those with specific health conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential economic recession and financial collapse","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction projects involving large teams of contractors and subcontractors may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases such as covid-19.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 through global travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Congestion on road networks contributing to disease propagation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction projects creating potential infection hotspots","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases due to increased infrastructure development and construction activities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for strain on healthcare infrastructure due to an increase in contagious diseases resulting from construction activities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for community-wide disease transmission due to increased movement and interaction resulting from infrastructure development.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential conflict of interest in research findings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate and exaggerated information about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accurate evidence and data sharing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreaction and exaggeration of the seriousness of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the new virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exaggerated estimates of infection rates and case fatality rate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Panic shopping and excess hospital admissions leading to strain on health systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High infection rates in adult populations with acute respiratory illness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in prevalence and case fatality rates across different populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison to the 1918 influenza pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation and media hype surrounding the coronavirus outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to travel and social disruption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact and disruption of global markets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources in coronavirus response, diverting attention from other contagious diseases like influenza.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enhanced detection and lower hospitalization thresholds may strain healthcare systems and increase mortality from other serious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Maintaining prolonged lockdowns may lead to worse consequences than an acute epidemic wave, impacting economic and social disruption.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient evidence for entry port screening and social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear evidence on protective measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources due to panic shopping","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underestimation of the infection fatality rate due to uncounted deaths and undiagnosed infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of epidemic curve as exponential community spread, influenced by availability of test kits and willingness for testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of extreme measures of unknown effectiveness in response to alarming circumstances","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
